DeathSpank(: Orphans of Justice); Year: 2010; Includes: Update 1

Cover:

System requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ graphics memory: 256 MB
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ available storage: 2 Gb

Description:

Game from the legendary Ron Gilbert, creator of the series Monkey Island, parodied all the fantasy and RPG features at once. In this game, Monkey Island meets Diablo!
Charming, clever, mysterious. These are just some of the words that would not be appropriate in describing DeathSpank. First strike, and ask questions later - it's not about the local hero. He does not even understand why on earth there are any questions. DeathSpank - rarest of rare, it's a really funny video.
DeathSpank is a fascinating hack'n'slash RPG, the action taking place in a huge and dangerous world. In between the fierce fighting, the protagonist also solves the riddle thrown in the tangled plot.

Features:
"A huge, seamless world."
"A lot of weapons and armor."
"The epic story. And it is not what you are used to seeing in a video game."
"Sophisticated but at the same time pure puzzles."
"Mystical artifact called Artifact."
"Pieces that explode and blow up your brain."
"Pieces that do not explode and blow up your brain."

DeathSpank: Thongs of Virtue; Year: 2010; Includes: DLC Packs 1 and 2

Cover:

System requirements:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ available storage: 2 GB minimum
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Video Card: ATI Radeon X1800 GTO 256MB and the Nvidia GeForce 6800 Ultra 256MB cards; Shader 2.0 and 24 bit depth buffer support required
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Local co-op requirements: A controller is required for the second player

Description:

DeathSpank: Thongs of Virtue is the sequel to DeathSpank, released in July. The protagonist must destroy the six magical belts that enslaved their masters. Thongs of Virtue takes place features an unprecedented location, as well as modern and sci-fi weapons and enemies. For the local co-op, a new character - "Ninjatastic Steve" - is available.
Thongs of Virtue offer a longer storyline campaign, during which Deathspank crosses the seas on a pirate ship, visits the North Pole and fights with alien robots. History will again be very comical and fun to collect the powerful "artifacts" in the name of saving the universe. In the sequel, the hero will have to seek the six "all-powerful" cowards who are granted unprecedented power and who converted all of their respective owners in terrible villains. All panties which got into "the wrong hands" must be destroyed. Due to Ron Gilbert's part, the amount of humor per square meter will not decrease.
Playing DeathSpank: Thongs of Virtue is much like the original game - beat enemies to death, to gain experience open prize cards with special abilities. Hothead Games promises that the puzzles become more complex and the NPCs too somewhat, but you have to think about what items you need to connect together in the inventory.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Free storage: 1.5 GB

Description:

Continuation of the crazy adventures of DeathSpank! Some better not to wear panties, among other things...
In The Baconing, Deathspank meets face to face with AntiSpanker, and on the way gets acquainted with new characters and meets old friends. The game has four new bosses, as well as new locations: Forbidden Zone, Forest of Tomorrow, Lake Ancient Mariner, and others. A new friend of the protagonist named Bob from Marketing is able to "shoot laser beams, eat corpses to regain health, and eat live bodies as a bonus attack."
